name: GridView
description: An auto-generated grid view that calculate item size according to given props

props.name: items
props.description: The list of items based on GridListItem props

props.name: viewWidth
props.description: pass the desired grid view width (will improve loading time)

props.name: numColumns
props.description: Number of items to show in a row

props.name: lastItemLabel
props.description: overlay label for the last item

props.name: lastItemOverlayColor
props.description: color of overlay label for the last item

props.name: keepItemSize
props.description: whether to keep the items initial size when orientation changes, in which case the apt number of columns will be calculated automatically.

props.name: renderCustomItem
props.description: Pass to render a custom item
